channel.title: Is cheating Evil?
channel.description:
Is cheating Evil?
In my opinion it is not, but it was once. I think Runescape used to be a great game. I don't think Runescape 2 ruined Runescape, I think the new attitude of Jagex ruined Runescape. They used to be about creating great games. Now they all it seems they think about is making the games they have already created turn a profit month after month update after update. One of the best gaming moments ever was player killing in the wilderness on runescape classic. Runescape does alot of things right in a game, and alot of things wrong. Jagex has the right to do things like introduce things like fatigue and random events, but shutting down Runescape Classic was evil. How much does it cost to run a Runescape classic server? What the fuck is wrong with them? Did they have to shut it down? No. They're just assholes. So let's cheat at they're game untill it's fully fucking destroyed.

item.title: Is cheating Evil?
item.dc:creator: @the_one1 the one
item.description:
@the_one1 wrote:

Actually cheating IS kinda evil.
Jagex is trying to earn money BUT they do it by ruining the game for us.Think about it some more,and you will find that without runescape,this would almost be all gone.The neopets section would be one of the only surviving sections.We can cheat but try to think about jagex,even though they are __________(fill in the blanks with the appropriate word).

In a way,we need to thank jagex or else,where would we all be?Kaitnieks,mopar,all the great coders would be leading a normal life with no recognition whatsoever and we wouldn’t even know they exist.Sure,their rules may be crossing the limit for some of you but hey,rules are there to make things safer.I may sound pro jagex but I’m not.I hate the membership because you have to pay alot.They ARE irritating but they are also trying to make a living.

On the other hand,cheating Is not evil for the simple reason that jagex could ignore us and even create another server to let us try to practice our coding skills,but then we would have to have an agreement so as not to get on each others nerves.Of course jagex could always be lying to us but hey,cheating will never die.

I wasted alot of time proportionately to what I normaly use,so maybe you guys could ponder on this for a while

Read full topic

item.title: Is cheating Evil?
item.dc:creator: @Your_Grandpa Your Grandpa
item.description:
@Your_Grandpa wrote:

Cheating is evil:

[ul][li]if you leech some scripts/programs & then brag about it[/li]
[li]if you do it just because jagex gets some money for their hard work[/li]
[li]if you hate runescape/jagex - why the fuck would you play it in any way at all if you fucking hate it? :S[/li]
[li]if you use tons of chars to gather resources and then use them on your main - just to brag how great of a runescape player you are…[/li]
[li]if you cheat because you want to “have a life” - runescape is supposed to be a form of entertainment, if you don’t want to have fun with it then STOP PLAYING IT[/li]
[li]you think cheating == scamming[/li]
[li]if you use cheating as a way of ruining the fun of legit players[/li][/ul]

Cheating isn’t evil:

[ul][li]if you create the cheating tool/script yourself and are proud of the tool/script, not how great of a runescape player you are[/li]
[li]you are trying to create actual AI player and it doesn’t unfairly ruin legit players playing experience[/li]
[li]YOU ARE NOT PROUD OF BEATING 10 YEAR OLDS AT A GAME BY MAKING A SCRIPT THAT YOU DIDN’T EVEN MAKE YOURSELF DO ALL THE WORK FOR YOU![/li][/ul]

Tell me if I missed something & start flaming me.

Read full topic

They only cheating I do is autotypers, and that’s only for merchanting.

Read full topic

item.title: Is cheating Evil?
item.dc:creator: @Hyjall Hyjall
item.description:
@Hyjall wrote:

Never would I see cheating as evil, come to think of it. It’s more of a “Solution”.

Let’s make this clear, I do not hate Jagex, I do not hate Runescape. I cheated because it’s basicly in our nature to do so.
Be serious, if you had the option to do the dishes or let the dishwasher do it, you would obviously pick the easy way out. It’s in our nature to do this and we have been doing it for the whole of our lives. Think about it, we design internet for the purpose of communication so physical transport is no longer needed in certain situations. We design cars and planes to get to places faster and thus saving time to do the things we like.

Why, tell me, should this be any different with cheating? Let’s face it, it’s not always fun to cut 10.000 yew logs in order to buy that one item that you want. True, it gives more satisfaction if you do it personal. But really, I don’t care, and I’m guessing you don’t either.

But, to be honest, that is not my main reason to cheat. I cheat because, when I look at Runescape I see a problem. A problem that can be solved, making a bot, or basicly any cheat in a game brings tons of problems, and I take joy in solving problems.

In short, No. Cheating is not evil

Read full topic

Pfff… Cheating isn’t evil. Cheating is fun! Sometimes I don’t like to cheat, like on certain games like Final Fantasy 7. I tried my best and eventually I beat the game without cheats, and it was a lot of fun too.

Cheating on rs isn’t illegal so nobody really cares… unless you create your own private server with RuneScape code and have disobeyed copyright infringements which is illegal. THEN I won’t lol.

~Ron[/quote]
